## ü§ñ Meet the Mini Robots  
From robotic arms to quadrupeds and bipedal systems, WLKATA delivers **high-performance**, **sleek**, and **educationally powerful** mini robots designed to bridge the gap between classroom learning and the future of robotics.

---

## üéØ Our Mission  
To empower the next generation of engineers, developers, and innovators by bringing **Embodied-AI robotics** directly into the classroom.  
We create **advanced**, **user-friendly**, and **DIY-ready** solutions tailored for:

- Universities & Vocational Institutes  
- K7‚ÄìK12 Classrooms  
- Robotics Clubs & Makerspaces  

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Our Solutions  
- Plug-and-play robotics kits built for real-world learning  
- Comprehensive **curricula**, **textbooks**, and **teaching resources**  
- Full hardware/software stack for embodied AI and robotics education  
- Seamless integration with **Python**, **MATLAB**, **ROS2**, **Arduino**, and more  

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Products  
- [**Mirobot**](https://www.wlkata.com/products/wlkata-best-6-axis-stem-educational-robot-arm-kit) ‚Äì 6DOF Educational Robotic Arm  
- [**MT4 üÜï**](https://www.wlkata.com/products/wlkata-mt4-essential-kit-metal-4-axis-robotic-arm-reverse-engineering-made-easy) ‚Äì High-Performance, Rebuildable Metal Arm  
- [**Haro üîú**](https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/haro380#/) ‚Äì Mini Industrial 6DOF System
- [**MarchX**](https://www.wlkata.com/products/marchx-pro-lidar-ai-kit-wlkata-quadruped-l-robot-sim2real-remote-control-depth-camera-lidar-ai-function-sdk-reinforcement-learning) - Quadruped Robotic Dog
- [**BRAVE**](https://www.wlkata.com/products/brave-edu-kit-biped-robot-three-multi-modal-point-foot-wheeled-sole-modal-rgbd-camera-sdk-openapi-sim2real-ai-robotics-humanoid-research-platform) - Biped Robot

---

## üîß Useful Software

All software and latest firmware/driver can be found at [Download Center](https://www.wlkata.com/pages/download-center)

|         Name          | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|:---------------------:|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     WLKATA Studio     | The official software for programming and controlling WLKATA robotic arms offers Blockly, Teach-and-play, Python, and G-code programming interfaces for both beginners and advanced users.                                                                                                                      |
|  WLKATA BlockFactory  | The official software for programming WLKATA robotic arms, WLKATA AI-HUB series, WLKATA accessories, and all Arduino-compatible products uses an exciting graphic programming interface. This software is perfect for designing a wide range of creative multi-robot automation projects, both large and small. |

---

## üåü Popular Repositories
|                  | Repository                                                                                 |
|------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Arduino Library  | [wlkata-Arduino-MEGA-2560](https://github.com/wlkata/wlkata-Arduino-MEGA-2560)             |
| C Library        | [WlkataC](https://github.com/wlkata/WlkataC)                                               |
| Python SDKs      | [WLKATA-Python-SDK-wlkatapython](https://github.com/wlkata/WLKATA-Python-SDK-wlkatapython) |
| Microbit Library | [wlkata_micro_bit](https://github.com/wlkata/wlkata_micro_bit)                             |
| ROS Repositories | [ROS2_WLKATA](https://github.com/wlkata/ROS2_WLKATA)                                       |
| ROS Repositories | [ROS2_Mirobot](https://github.com/Eagle-Creative/ROS2-Jazzy-Mirobot-Interface)             |
| MT4 Model        | [STEP and STL file](https://github.com/wlkata/MT4-STL)                                     |  
| Machine Learning | [wlkatapython-extensions](https://github.com/wlkata/wlkatapython-extensions)               |
